A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Loved it!  I personally think it is better than the last one.  It was entertaining and I did not see everything coming.  I enjoyed some of the humor and nods to the original trilogy.  For a second in a trilogy\, it was great\, because it wasn't simply a filler to get you to the end.  It's tying up some problems and relationships while introducing new characters and relationships all of which work towards unfolding the story of the bigger picture.
